scripts.dist:linux:arm64:docker: docker run --rm -v "$PWD":/app -v /app/node_modules -v "${ELECTRON_CACHE:-$HOME/Library/Caches/electron}":/root/.cache/electron -w /app -e USE_SYSTEM_FPM=true --platform linux/arm64 node:20 bash -c "apt-get update && apt-get install -y ruby ruby-dev build-essential && gem install fpm --no-document && npm ci && npm run dist -- --linux --arm64"
scripts.dist:linux:x64:docker: docker run --rm -v "$PWD":/app -v /app/node_modules -v "${ELECTRON_CACHE:-$HOME/Library/Caches/electron}":/root/.cache/electron -w /app --platform linux/amd64 electronuserland/builder:20 bash -c "npm ci && npm run dist -- --linux --x64"
scripts.bee:start: test -f bee-data/config.yaml || npm run bee:init; ./bee-bin/mac-arm64/bee start --config=./bee-data/config.yaml
scripts.bee:stop: pkill -SIGTERM bee || echo 'Bee not running or failed to stop'
scripts.bee:status:
echo '--- HEALTH ---'; curl -s http://127.0.0.1:1633/health; echo '

--- READINESS ---'; curl -s http://127.0.0.1:1633/readiness; echo '

--- STATUS ---'; curl -s http://127.0.0.1:1633/status; echo '

--- PEERS ---'; curl -s http://127.0.0.1:1633/peers | grep -o '"address":' | wc -l | xargs echo 'Peer Count:'; echo '
--- ADDRESSES ---'; curl -s http://127.0.0.1:1633/addresses
scripts.ipfs:start: test -d ipfs-data || npm run ipfs:init; IPFS_PATH=./ipfs-data ./ipfs-bin/mac-arm64/ipfs daemon
scripts.ipfs:stop: pkill -SIGTERM ipfs || echo 'IPFS not running or failed to stop'
scripts.ipfs:status:
echo '--- ID ---'; IPFS_PATH=./ipfs-data curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:5001/api/v0/id | head -c 500; echo '

--- PEERS ---'; curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:5001/api/v0/swarm/peers | grep -o '"Peer":' | wc -l | xargs echo 'Peer Count:'
